description: This PHP source file generates a web-based status page for network and device information of a gateway device, including network connectivity status, cable modem details, channel information, and related configuration parameters.

methods.name: div_mod
methods.description: Custom function to perform division and modulus in one step, returning quotient and remainder.

methods.name: sec2dhms
methods.description: Converts seconds into a formatted string displaying days, hours, minutes, and seconds.
